by a new owner to accept an ownership transfer"},"addLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":" The process: 1.Accepts RBTC 2.Sends RBTC to WRBTC contract in order to wrap RBTC to WRBTC 3.Calls 'addLiquidity' on LiquidityPoolConverter contract 4.Transfers pool tokens to user ","params":{"_amount":"amount of liquidity to add","_liquidityPoolConverterAddress":"address of LiquidityPoolConverter contract","_minReturn":"minimum return-amount of reserve tokens"},"return":"amount of pool tokens minted"},"addLiquidityToV1(address,address[],uint256[],uint256)":{"details":" The process: 1.Accepts RBTC 2.Sends RBTC to WRBTC contract in order to wrap RBTC to WRBTC 3.Accepts reserve token and approve LiquidityPoolConverter to transfer 4.Calls 'addLiquidity' on LiquidityPoolConverter contract 5.Transfers pool tokens to user ","params":{"_liquidityPoolConverterAddress":"address of LiquidityPoolConverter contract","_minReturn":"minimum return-amount of reserve tokens","_reserveAmounts":"amount of each reserve token. The first element should be the amount of RBTC","_reserveTokens":"address of each reserve token. The first element should be the address of WRBTC"},"return":"amount of pool tokens minted"},"convertByPath(address[],uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"amount to convert from, in the source token","_minReturn":"if the conversion results in an amount smaller than the minimum return - it is cancelled, must be greater than zero ","_path":"conversion path between two tokens in the network"},"return":"amount of tokens received from the conversion"},"removeLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":" The process:      1.Transfers pool tokens to this contract 2.Calls 'removeLiquidity' on LiquidityPoolConverter contract 3.Calls 'withdraw' on WRBTC contract in order to unwrap WRBTC to RBTC 4.Sneds RBTC to user ","params":{"_amount":"amount of pool tokens to burn","_liquidityPoolConverterAddress":"address of LiquidityPoolConverter contract","_minReturn":"minimum return-amount of reserve tokens "},"return":"amount of liquidity removed also WRBTC unwrapped to RBTC"},"removeLiquidityFromV1(address,uint256,address[],uint256[])":{"details":" The process:      1.Transfers pool tokens to this contract 2.Calls 'removeLiquidity' on LiquidityPoolConverter contract 3.Calls 'withdraw' on WRBTC contract in order to unwrap WRBTC to RBTC 4.Sneds RBTC and/or other reserve tokens to user ","params":{"_amount":"amount of pool tokens to burn","_liquidityPoolConverterAddress":"address of LiquidityPoolConverter contract","_reserveMinReturnAmounts":"minimum return-amount of each reserve token. The first element should be the minimum return-amount of WRBTC","_reserveTokens":"address of each reserve token. The first element should be the address of WRBTC"}},"restoreRegistry()":{"details":"restores the previous contract-registry"},"restrictRegistryUpdate(bool)":{"details":"restricts the permission to update the contract-registry ","params":{"_onlyOwnerCanUpdateRegistry":"indicates whether or not permission is restricted to owner only"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"allows transferring the contract ownership the new owner still needs to accept the transfer can only be called by the contract owner ","params":{"_newOwner":"new contract owner"}},"updateRegistry()":{"details":"updates to the new contract-registry"}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"convertByPath(address[],uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Before calling this function to swap token to RBTC, users need approve this contract to be able to spend or transfer their tokens"},"removeLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":" Before calling this function to remove liquidity, users need approve this contract to be able to spend or transfer their pool tokens"},"removeLiquidityFromV1(address,uint256,address[],uint256[])":{"notice":" Before calling this function to remove liquidity, users need approve this contract to be able nodes.documentation:
@notice 
Before calling this function to remove liquidity, users need approve this contract to be able to spend or transfer their pool tokens
     * @dev  
The process:     
1.Transfers pool tokens to this contract
2.Calls 'removeLiquidity' on LiquidityPoolConverter contract
3.Calls 'withdraw' on WRBTC contract in order to unwrap WRBTC to RBTC
4.Sneds RBTC to user

     * @param _liquidityPoolConverterAddress    address of LiquidityPoolConverter contract
@param _amount                           amount of pool tokens to burn
@param _minReturn                        minimum return-amount of reserve tokens

     * @return amount of liquidity removed also WRBTC unwrapped to RBTC

nodes.documentation:
@notice 
Before calling this function to remove liquidity, users need approve this contract to be able to spend or transfer their pool tokens
     * @dev  
The process:     
1.Transfers pool tokens to this contract
2.Calls 'removeLiquidity' on LiquidityPoolConverter contract
3.Calls 'withdraw' on WRBTC contract in order to unwrap WRBTC to RBTC
4.Sneds RBTC to user

     * @param _liquidityPoolConverterAddress    address of LiquidityPoolConverter contract
@param _amount                           amount of pool tokens to burn
@param _minReturn                        minimum return-amount of reserve tokens

     * @return amount of liquidity removed also WRBTC unwrapped to RBTC

nodes.name: convertByPath

acceptOwnership().details: used by a new owner to accept an ownership transfer

addLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256).details: The process: 1.Accepts RBTC 2.Sends RBTC to WRBTC contract in order to wrap RBTC to WRBTC 3.Calls 'addLiquidity' on LiquidityPoolConverter contract 4.Transfers pool tokens to user

addLiquidityToV1(address,address[],uint2.details: The process: 1.Accepts RBTC 2.Sends RBTC to WRBTC contract in order to wrap RBTC to WRBTC 3.Accepts reserve token and approve LiquidityPoolConverter to transfer 4.Calls 'addLiquidity' on LiquidityPoolConverter contract 5.Transfers pool tokens to user

params._reserveAmounts: amount of each reserve token. The first element should be the amount of RBTC
params._reserveTokens: address of each reserve token. The first element should be the address of WRBTC

params._amount: amount to convert from, in the source token
params._minReturn: if the conversion results in an amount smaller than the minimum return - it is cancelled, must be greater than zero
params._path: conversion path between two tokens in the network

convertByPath(address[],uint256,uint256).return: amount of tokens received from the conversion

removeLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256).details: The process:      1.Transfers pool tokens to this contract 2.Calls 'removeLiquidity' on LiquidityPoolConverter contract 3.Calls 'withdraw' on WRBTC contract in order to unwrap WRBTC to RBTC 4.Sneds RBTC to user

params._amount: amount of pool tokens to burn

removeLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256).return: amount of liquidity removed also WRBTC unwrapped to RBTC

removeLiquidityFromV1(address,uint256,ad.details: The process:      1.Transfers pool tokens to this contract 2.Calls 'removeLiquidity' on LiquidityPoolConverter contract 3.Calls 'withdraw' on WRBTC contract in order to unwrap WRBTC to RBTC 4.Sneds RBTC and/or other reserve tokens to user

params._amount: amount of pool tokens to burn
params._reserveMinReturnAmounts: minimum return-amount of each reserve token. The first element should be the minimum return-amount of WRBTC
params._reserveTokens: address of each reserve token. The first element should be the address of WRBTC

restrictRegistryUpdate(bool).details: restricts the permission to update the contract-registry

params._onlyOwnerCanUpdateRegistry: indicates whether or not permission is restricted to owner only

transferOwnership(address).details: allows transferring the contract ownership the new owner still needs to accept the transfer can only be called by the contract owner

convertByPath(address[],uint256,uint256).notice: Before calling this function to swap token to RBTC, users need approve this contract to be able to spend or transfer their tokens

removeLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Before calling this function to remove liquidity, users need approve this contract to be able to spend or transfer their pool tokens

removeLiquidityFromV1(address,uint256,ad.notice: Before calling this function to remove liquidity, users need approve this contract to be able to spend or transfer their pool tokens
